title: Skip a Monthly Subscription
description: A customer wants to skip their next monthly subscription delivery but not cancel the subscription entirely.

tasks.description: Log into their account and navigate to the 'Manage Subscription' page.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer accesses their subscription details.
The customer chooses to skip the upcoming delivery.

tasks.description: The system confirms the next shipment has been skipped and shows the date of the following shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer's subscription is paused for one cycle and will resume automatically.
